action_card_infos.name: Undivided Heart
action_card_infos.content:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Ganyu</color>, equip this card.
After Ganyu equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Frostflake Arrow</color> once.
When your Ganyu, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frostflake Arrow</color>: <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> dealt by this Skill +1 if this Skill has been used before during this match, and it now deals 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby instead.
(You must have Ganyu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Shaken, Not Purred
action_card_infos.content:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Diona</color>, equip this card.
After Diona equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> once.
When your Diona, who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cat-Claw Shield</color>, its <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points +1.
(You must have Diona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
action_card_infos.content:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Kaeya</color>, equip this card.
After Kaeya equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> once.
After your Kaeya, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frostgnaw</color>, he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kaeya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Steady Breathing
action_card_infos.content:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Chongyun</color>, equip this card.
After Chongyun equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> once.
When your Chongyun, who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Chonghua Frost Field</color>, it will have the following effects: Starting <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> +1, will cause your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> to deal +1 DMG.
(You must have Chongyun in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
action_card_infos.content: The <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Elemental Infusion</color> created by your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Kamisato Ayaka</color>, who has this card equipped, allows the character to which it is attached to deal +1 <color=#99FFFFFF><color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color></color>.\nWhen you switch to Kamisato Ayaka, who has this card equipped: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(You must have Kamisato Ayaka in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Glorious Season
action_card_infos.content:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Barbara</color>, equip this card.
After Barbara equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> once.
When your Barbara, who has this card equipped, is on the field, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Melody Loop</color> will allow you to spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character." (Once per round)
(You must have Barbara in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: The Scent Remained
action_card_infos.content:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Xingqiu</color>, equip this card.
After Xingqiu equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Fatal Rainscreen</color> once.
When your Xingqiu, who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Rain Sword</color>, its starting <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> +1.
(You must have Xingqiu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Prophecy of Submersion
action_card_infos.content:

When Mona equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Stellaris Phantasm</color> once.
When your Mona, who has this card equipped, is the active character, the <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro-Related Reactions</color> you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
(You must have Mona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.content:

action_card_infos.name: Instructor's Cap

action_card_infos.name: Wangshu Inn
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal the most injured character on standby for 2 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>

action_card_infos.name: Favonius Cathedral
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal your active character for 2 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>

action_card_infos.name: Paimon
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> Create <color=#FFFFFFFF>Omni Element</color> ×2.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>

action_card_infos.name: Katheryne
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character":</color> This switch is considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>. (Once per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Timaeus
action_card_infos.content: Comes with 2 Transmutation Materials when played.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Gain 1 Transmutation Material.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing an Artifact Card:</color> If possible, spend Transmutation Materials equal to the total cost of the Artifact and equip this Artifact for free. (Once per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Wagner
action_card_infos.content: Comes with 2 Forging Billets when played.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Gain 1 Forging Billet.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing a Weapon Card:</color> If possible, spend Forging Billets equal to the total cost of the Weapon and equip this Weapon for free. (Once per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Chef Mao
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After playing a Food Event Card:</color> Create 1 random Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Tubby
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing a Location Support Card:</color> Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Timmie
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Triggers automatically once per Round:</color> This card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 Pigeon</color>.\nWhen this card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>3 Pigeons</color>, discard this card, then draw 1 card and create <color=#FFFFFFFF>Omni Element</color> ×1.

action_card_infos.name: Liben
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Collect your unused Elemental Dice (Max 1 of each Elemental Type).\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> If this card has collected 3 Elemental Dice, draw 2 cards and create <color=#FFFFFFFF>Omni Element</color> ×2, then discard this card.

action_card_infos.name: Chang the Ninth
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When either side uses a Skill:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> was dealt, or an <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Reaction</color> was triggered, this card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 Inspiration</color>.\nWhen this card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>3 Inspiration</color>, discard this card, then draw 2 cards.

action_card_infos.name: Ellin
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you use a Skill that has already been used in this Round:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Iron Tongue Tian
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Energy</color>. (Active Character prioritized)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>

action_card_infos.name: Liu Su
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch characters:</color> If the character you switched to does not have <color=#FFFFFFFF>Energy</color>, they will gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Energy</color>. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>

action_card_infos.name: Parametric Transformer
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When either side uses a Skill:</color> If Elemental DMG was dealt, this card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 Qualitative Progress</color>.\nWhen this card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>3 Qualitative Progress</color>, discard this card, then create 3 different Basic Elemental Dice.

action_card_infos.name: NRE
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a Food Event Card:</color> Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck. (Once per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Ice
action_card_infos.content: Create 1 <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo Die</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice
action_card_infos.content: During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Waters
action_card_infos.content: Create 1 <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro Die</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Soothing Water
action_card_infos.content: Heal your active character for 2 HP and all your characters on standby for 1 HP.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Flames
action_card_infos.content: Create 1 <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro Die</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Fervent Flames
action_card_infos.content: During this round, the next instance of <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro-Related Reactions</color> your current active character triggers deals +3 DMG.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Thunder
action_card_infos.content: Create 1 <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro Die</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: High Voltage
action_card_infos.content: One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Energy</color>. (Active Character prioritized)\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Winds
action_card_infos.content: Create 1 <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo Die</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
action_card_infos.content: Switch to the target character and create <color=#FFFFFFFF>Omni Element</color> ×1.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Stone
action_card_infos.content: Create 1 <color=#FFE699FF>Geo Die</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#FFE699FF>Geo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Enduring Rock
action_card_infos.content: During this round, after your character deals <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> next time: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>, grant one such Status with 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points. \n(You must have at least 2 <color=#FFE699FF>Geo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Weeds
action_card_infos.content: Create 1 <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro Die</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Elemental Resonance: Sprawling Greenery
action_card_infos.content: During this round, the next Elemental Reaction your active character triggers deals +2 DMG.\nYour <color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame, Dendro Core, and Catalyzing Field</color> gain +1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: The Bestest Travel Companion!
action_card_infos.content: Convert the Elemental Dice spent to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Omni Element</color> ×2.

action_card_infos.name: Changing Shifts
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

action_card_infos.name: Toss-Up
action_card_infos.content: Select any Elemental Die to <color=#FFFFFFFF>reroll</color>. Can reroll 2 times.

action_card_infos.name: Strategize
action_card_infos.content: Draw 2 cards.

action_card_infos.name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
action_card_infos.content: Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:\nCreate <color=#FFFFFFFF>Omni Element</color> ×1 and your current active character gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Energy</color>.

action_card_infos.name: Leave It to Me!
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> This switch will be considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>.

action_card_infos.name: When the Crane Returned
action_card_infos.content: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you use a Skill:</color> Switch your next character in to be the active character.

action_card_infos.name: Starsigns
action_card_infos.content: Your current Active Character <color=#FFFFFFFF>gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Energy</color></color>.

action_card_infos.name: Calx's Arts
action_card_infos.content: Shift 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Energy</color> from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.

action_card_infos.name: Master of Weaponry
action_card_infos.content: Shift 1 Weapon Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters of the same Weapon Type.

action_card_infos.name: Blessing of the Divine Relic's Installation
action_card_infos.content: Shift 1 Artifact Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters.

action_card_infos.name: Quick Knit
action_card_infos.content: Choose one Summon on your side and grant it +1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>.

action_card_infos.name: Send Off
action_card_infos.content: Choose one Summon on the opposing side and destroy it.

action_card_infos.name: Guardian's Oath
action_card_infos.content: Destroy all Summons. (Affects both you and your opponent!)

action_card_infos.name: Abyssal Summons
action_card_infos.content: Summon 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Random Hilichurl Summon</color>!\n(You must have at least 2 Monster characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

action_card_infos.name: Jueyun Guoba
action_card_infos.content: During this Round, the target character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> deals +1 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Adeptus' Temptation
action_card_infos.content: During this Round, the target character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Burst</color> deals +3 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
action_card_infos.content: During this Round, the target character takes -3 DMG the next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Northern Smoked Chicken
action_card_infos.content: During this Round, the target character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>Unaligned Element</color>.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Sweet Madame
action_card_infos.content: Heal the target character for 1 HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
action_card_infos.content: Heal the target character for 2 HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Mushroom Pizza
action_card_infos.content: Heal the target character for 1 HP. For the next two Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again at the End Phase.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

action_card_infos.name: Minty Meat Rolls
action_card_infos.content: Before this Round ends, the target character's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> cost 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>Unaligned Element</color>.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
